welcome_message_body: Welcome to Agua Prieta, Mexico! Get ready to experience the charm of this vibrant border town, known for its rich cultural heritage and friendly locals. We invite you to explore all that Agua Prieta has to offer and enjoy your stay in our beautiful city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Douglas Municipal Airport serves all domestic flights and provides various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Douglas Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo operations for the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bisbee-Douglas International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Bisbee-Douglas International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
